definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Two years after his last dose of LSD he was still deliring.
sentences.chinese: 停服麻醉藥雖已過了兩年，但他仍被幻覺困擾着。

sentences.english: Rocko took some junk and just about fell out from it.
sentences.chinese: 羅科服了一些麻醉藥，幾乎被醉倒了。

sentences.english: What is this?It looks like anaesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 這是什麼？看起來好像是麻醉藥。

sentences.english: The dentist gave her another whiff of anaesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 牙科醫師又給她噴射了氣霧麻醉藥。

sentences.english: He lay in a drugged sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他服了麻醉藥後睡得很熟。

sentences.english: When he gave her a shot of Novocain, she began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 當醫生給我女兒注射麻醉藥時，她開始嚎啕大哭。

sentences.english: How can I convince you of the dangers of drug- taking?
sentences.chinese: 我怎麼能使你相信服麻醉藥的危險呢？

sentences.english: During treatment, a mixture of a corticosteroid and a local anesthetic was injected intra-articularly.
sentences.chinese: 關節內注射皮質類固醇激素和局部麻醉藥。

sentences.english: She was heavily drugged during the kidnapping.
sentences.chinese: 她遭綁架期間被人灌下了大量麻醉藥。

sentences.english: I did all that without taking drugs or sleeping pills.
sentences.chinese: 不需要服用麻醉藥或是安眠藥。

sentences.english: The use of narcotics by teenagers is a problem in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 青少年服用麻醉藥在許多國家中都是一個問題。

sentences.english: Mecon shell belongs to anesthesia medicine.
sentences.chinese: 罌粟殼屬於麻醉藥品管理。

sentences.english: The government is taking a tough line on drug abuse.
sentences.chinese: 政府對濫用麻醉藥品採取強硬方針。

sentences.english: What type of anesthetic will be used?
sentences.chinese: 手術過程中我將使用什麼麻醉藥？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the hospital management of narcotic drugs and countermeasures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討醫院麻醉藥品的管理方法和對策。

sentences.english: He drugged his roommate and stole his money.
sentences.chinese: 他對他的室友下了麻醉藥，然後偷了他的錢。

definition: unable to turn around a hopeless situation (idiom)/to fail to save the situation
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
fluid loaded into a syringe for a hypodermic injection
to heave a sigh of relief
medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
to help a mother give birth
